title: Hellbent House
description: “Hellbent House” is a novelette length story (approximately 35 printed pages) from Randy Chandler's collection, Devils, Death & Dark Wonders, also available in ebook and print.Haunted by a house seen only in her dreams, Ava locates the old plantation house in the real world and makes the mistake of venturing inside. She lands in the middle of an honest-to-goodness ghost story with murderous roots in the Civil War, but in this hellbent house, there are things far worse than ghosts. And one of them is hungry for Ava's soul.Also included is an excerpt of Randy Chandler's previously out-of-print and hard-to-find novel HELLz BELLz, now available on Kindle and Nook.
author: Randy Chandler
